entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -0.1°C
